author: ngn
msg: On-the-fly SSL security (as with AUTH) now works with MINA thanks to Trustin Lee over at dev@mina (http://permalink.gmane.org/gmane.comp.apache.directory.mina.devel/2896).

author: alally
msg: Cleaning up test cases.  In some multi-threaded test cases,
threads would throw exceptions and terminate, but this is not
reported by JUnit as an exception.  Instead the thread needs to
store the Exception in a field and have the main test thread
check for it.  Fixing this exposed some poorly designed tests that
behaved nondeterministically; these have also been fixed.
